comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/MariumAZ>@MariumAZ</denchmark-link> This is an issue with the recent release of botocore <denchmark-link:https://github.com/boto/botocore/issues/2187>boto/botocore#2187</denchmark-link> . Right now, you can use the solution suggested in the post in that issue: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/boto/botocore/issues/2187#issuecomment-712819351>boto/botocore#2187 (comment)</denchmark-link>
I am going to pin down the versions with a PR to fix this issue. Thank you for reporting

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/MariumAZ>@MariumAZ</denchmark-link> just released a new version and that should fix the issue that you encountered. I ran the quick start guide with the new version and everything works. Let me know if you still encounter this issue, happy to help
yes thanks it works this time .
